channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe Systems Incorporated -- Digital Editions
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe Systems Incorporated -- Digital Editions

item.title: CVE-2017-11280|2024-08-05T18:05:29.929Z -- adobe%20systems%20incorporated -- digital%20editions
item.description: Adobe Digital Editions 4.5.4 and earlier has an exploitable memory corruption vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.
